name: Swati Dash
about: 5 + years of experience at a Global Delivery level. Providing advanced analytics to enable both business stakeholders and HR teams with valuable insights and recommendations, facilitating informed decision-making and creation of precise strategies for people-related interventions.

- Working closely with senior leadership to deliver high quality analysis, reporting and presentation
- Performing deep dive analysis on industry vs organization trends
- Working on Sentiment Analytics using R Programming to produce qualitative insights.
- Forecasting and using predictive analytics on quarterly projections.
